segments.text: excuse me ; is this seat taken ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no . It's all yours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: thank you very much . My name is Ashlan . It's nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Carson . It's nice to mee you , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: the weather is so warm for December , don't you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it is unusually warm . I blame it on global warming .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: global warming is wreaking havoc everywhere .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: so sure . Are you from around here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no . I'm new here . I just moved here a few months ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: where are you from ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm from China . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am from Texas . I was in China once , but it was a long time ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: did you enjoy it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did . I especially liked the food . What do you think about the food here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's very different from Chinese food , but I am getting used to it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that the Da Vinci Code that you've got there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , have you read it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , but I saw the movie . What do you think about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , to be honest , I've only gotten though 10 pages of it . So far , though , it's interesting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , this is my stop . it was nice talking with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: likewise . Bye !
segments.speaker: S1
